glsa.title: Shadow: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: An insecure temporary file usage in Shadow may allow local users to gain root privileges.

background.p: Shadow is a set of tools to deal with user accounts.

description.p: Paul Szabo reported a race condition in the "login" executable when setting up tty permissions.

impact.p: A local attacker belonging to the "utmp" group could use symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files and possibly gain root privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Shadow users should upgrade to the latest version:
